name: Dolors i Mercè
desc: La Dolors i la Mercè, que ronden els 80 anys, en fa 60 que són amigues. Es van conèixer de jovenetes estiuejant a la costa, i des de llavors són inseparables. Quan es van morir els seus marits ara fa uns anys, van decidir anar a viure juntes per fer-se costat i companyia. Ara van juntes a comprar el pa als matins, a jugar al bingo a la llibreria a les tardes de dimarts, i saben que no estan soles si es tenen l’una a l’altra.
descENG: Dolors and Mercè, both around 80 years old, have been friends for 60 years. They met as young girls while spending summers on the coast, and they’ve been inseparable ever since. When their husbands passed away a few years ago, they decided to move in together to support and keep each other company. Now they go buy bread together in the mornings, play bingo at the bookstore on Tuesday afternoons, and they know they’re never alone as long as they have each other.
